label: 添臥
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: A feminine bed partner, a girl of good family, often somewhat the boy's senior, who usually became his principal wife at a later date.  Acquired at the Coming-of-Age ceremony (genpuku or genbuku). (p. 373) [元服] [HW: also 副臥]
